statements: SELECT * FROM police_misconduct_reports LIMIT 10;
SELECT officer_name, incident_date, location FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE misconduct_type = 'Excessive Force';
SELECT description, officer_name FROM police_misconduct_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name, location FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE misconduct_type = 'Discrimination';
SELECT officer_name, incident_date, misconduct_type FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE officer_name LIKE 'John%' AND location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY officer_name;
SELECT report_id, officer_name, incident_date, misconduct_type, location FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE misconduct_type IN ('Excessive Force', 'Corruption') ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT description FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE location = 'Chicago' AND misconduct_type = 'Harassment' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name, location, description FROM police_misconduct_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY officer_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM police_reports;
SELECT officer_name, report_date, description FROM accountability_measures;
SELECT report_date, officer_name, department FROM police_reports WHERE department='Traffic';
SELECT measure_id, measure_name, measure_date FROM accountability_measures ORDER BY measure_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM police_reports;
SELECT * FROM police_reports WHERE department = 'Traffic' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT officer_name, report_date FROM police_reports WHERE department = 'Crime' AND officer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM police_reports;
SELECT officer_name, department, description FROM accountability_measures WHERE measure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM police_reports WHERE department = 'Traffic' OR department = 'Crime' ORDER BY report_date DESC, officer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM police_officers;
SELECT officer_id, officer_name, department FROM police_officers WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT officer_id, officer_name, badge_number FROM police_officers WHERE department = 'Traffic';
SELECT * FROM misconduct_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT officer_id, measure_type, measure_date FROM accountability_measures WHERE measure_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM police_officers WHERE department = 'Traffic' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT officer_name, badge_number FROM police_officers ORDER BY officer_name ASC, badge_number DESC;
SELECT po.officer_id, po.officer_name, mr.report_date FROM police_officers po LEFT JOIN misconduct_reports mr ON po.officer_id = mr.officer_id WHERE mr.report_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT officer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM police_officers po JOIN misconduct_reports mr ON po.officer_id = mr.officer_id GROUP BY officer_name ORDER BY num_reports DESC;

SELECT po.officer_name, am.measure_type, am.measure_date FROM police_officers po JOIN accountability_measures am ON po.officer_id = am.officer_id WHERE am.measure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM police_officers;
SELECT name, precinct FROM police_officers WHERE rank='Sergeant';
SELECT report_date, severity FROM misconduct_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investigation_teams WHERE team_lead='John Doe';
SELECT action_taken, outcome FROM accountability_measures WHERE report_id=5;
SELECT * FROM police_officers WHERE precinct = 5;
SELECT officer_id, name, rank FROM police_officers WHERE rank = 'Sergeant' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM misconduct_reports WHERE misconduct_type = 'Corruption' AND severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM investigation_teams WHERE team_lead = 'James Smith' AND team_member1 = 'Emily Johnson';

SELECT misconduct_reports.report_id, accountability_measures.action_taken FROM misconduct_reports INNER JOIN accountability_measures ON misconduct_reports.report_id = accountability_measures.report_id;
SELECT * FROM police_department;
SELECT police_department_name, city, state FROM police_department ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_rank FROM officer WHERE officer_rank = 'Sergeant' ORDER BY officer_name;
SELECT incident_date, location FROM incident WHERE location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT complaint_date, complaint_description, status FROM complaint WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY complaint_date;
SELECT * FROM police_department WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY police_department_name DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_rank FROM officer WHERE date_joined >= '2021-01-01' AND date_joined <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY officer_rank;
SELECT complaint_description FROM complaint WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY;
SELECT incident_date, location FROM incident WHERE location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM investigation WHERE status = 'ongoing' ORDER BY complaint_id, incident_id;
